description: Mainly focused in Frontend development with Aurelia, Typescript, ESRI/ArcGis and Polymer and occasionally in SAPUI5. Backend development with MongoDB, Couchbase and SAP/ABAP. At the present moment developing projects for AMB (Àrea Metropolitana de Barcelona) and 'Mobile Yourself', a custom application to have all your SAP applications on your mobile devices

ABAP Software Consultant at eXeQuam. Working for client Desigual, where we assists all the divisions and departments of Desigual developing ABAP software solutions. IDOCs, System Integrations, Web-Services, PI

ABAP Sotware Developer for SAP ISH*MED Module. Developing software for Project ARGOS of Generalitat de Catalunya, where we assist multiple hospitals deploying software solutions for patient/personal management in the Healthcare sector. ABAP, SAP Consulting, System Integrations, HL7 Protocol, Web-Services, PI, SQL, SCRUM Methodology
location: C. Jesús Serra Santamans, 4 - Sant Cugat del Vallès (Spain)

description: Occasional  collaborator  with  the  department  of  Communication  Networks  in  Kungliga  TekniskaHögskolan. Developing a study of WSN networks coexisting with WLAN, extending the work developed in my Master Thesis.  Involves work on simulation environment NS2 and partial software developing inC++ and TCL. Writing a technical paper to be presented in an international conference and in a journal in 2013
